task: Scrape the list of highest grossing films from https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_highest-grossing_films
questions: How many $2 bn movies were released before 2020?
Which is the earliest film that grossed over $1.5 bn?
What's the correlation between the Rank and Peak?
Draw a scatterplot of Rank and Peak along with a dotted red regression line through it. Return as a base-64 encoded data URI under 100,000 bytes.
